function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of awareness about the importance of room ventilation in reducing COVID-19 risk","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 infection due to inadequate ventilation","Mitigation":"Education and awareness programs to emphasize the importance of room ventilation","Technologies":"Improved room ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Room managers, hospital administrators, infection control teams","Owner":"Health organizations, building managers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate indoor air quality due to limited ventilation and recirculation","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission due to poor air quality","Mitigation":"Improvement of existing ventilation systems, prevention of indoor air recirculation","Technologies":"Improved air inlets, fresh air circulation systems, portable air cleaners with mechanical filtration","People":"Building occupants, individuals in confined spaces","Owner":"Building managers, homeowners, landlords"},{"Description":"Lack of effective remote work infrastructure leading to prolonged indoor isolation","Impact":"Increased mental health challenges and lack of social interaction","Mitigation":"Development of robust internet infrastructure, support for remote work technology, promotion of social interaction","Technologies":"Smart home technology, high-speed internet, remote work collaboration tools","People":"Employees working from home","Owner":"Companies, internet service providers, technology companies"}]}
